definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: Hezekiah's prefect of the palace 2Ki 18:18, 2Ki 18:26, 2Ki 18:37, 2Ki 19:2, Is 22:20, Is 36:3, Is 36:11, Is 36:22, Is 37:2.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: son of Josiah, made king by Pharaoh 2Ki 23:34, 2Ch 36:4; = [[יְהוֹיׇקִים]] 2Ki 24:1, Je 1:3, 1Ch 3:15.
